name: Autodefect
description:
Your turret is out of control! Can you navigate through the factory without gunning down any of the worker robots? 

Autodefect is a game made for the GMTK 2020 game jam, with the theme 'Out of Control' This game utilizes the theme by having the player move their Out of control automatic turret through a level without it accidentally shooting any of the innocent worker bots around the level.

Heavily inspired by stealth games, the game play revolves around moving between cover, opening and closing doors, and making sure you don't make line of sight with any of the robots that patrol the level.
